product_name: Craft Active Run Capri Tights - Women's - 2012 Closeout
long_description: When your training calls for increasing your mileage, the Craft Active Run capri tights won't let you down. Stretch-woven fabric follows your every move and breathes well to help the miles fly by. Lightweight, breathable polyester/spandex blend wicks moisture away from skin and dries quickly; ergonomic construction allows freedom of movement. Snug fit provides support and eliminates chafing and rubbing. Built-in UPF 50+ sun protection shields skin from harmful ultraviolet rays. Zippered back pocket; drawstring-adjustable waistband with mesh interior; reflective details; 18 in. inseam. Closeout.
short_description: When your training calls for increasing your mileage, the Craft Active Run capri tights won't let you down. Stretch-woven fabric follows your every move and breathes well to help the miles fly by.
